Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Citadines Apart'hotel Saint-Germain-des-Prés Paris, you'll be centrally located in Paris, steps from Hotel de la Monnaie and Pont Neuf. This 4-star residence is close to Notre Dame Cathedral and Louvre Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 204 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a 24-hour fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. This residence has 3 meeting rooms available for events. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a 24-hour fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

With a stay at Citadines Apart'hotel Saint-Germain-des-Prés Paris, you'll be centrally located in Paris, steps from Hotel de la Monnaie and Pont Neuf. This 4-star residence is close to Notre Dame Cathedral and Louvre Museum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Hotel de la Monnaie - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Pont Neuf - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Sainte Chapelle - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Pont Saint-Michel - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Palais de Justice - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
French Academy - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Conciergerie - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Eugene Delacroix Museum - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Palais Abbatial - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Church of Saint Germain l'Auxerrois - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Theatre du Chatelet - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Petit Pont - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Pont Notre-Dame - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Place Saint-Germain-des-Pres - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Abbey of Saint-Germain-des-Pres - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi

The nearest airports are:
Paris (ORY-Orly) - 13.8 km / 8.6 mi
Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle) - 23.6 km / 14.6 mi

The preferred airport for Citadines Apart'hotel Saint-Germain-des-Prés Paris is Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
